ssot__SMSTemplate__dlm.name: SMS Template
ssot__SMSTemplate__dlm.description: The SMS Template DMO represents a reusable, standard format for text (SMS) messages.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EngagementAssetTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of engagement asset

ssot__EngagementMessageTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the engagement message type.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__MessageFormatTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the format type of the message.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the SMS engagement.

ssot__ParentEngagementAssetId__c.description: A reference ID to the associated parent engagement asset.

ssot__SendClassificationId__c.description: A reference ID to the two types of send classifications: Transactional (placing an order implies opt-in for an order confirmation email) or Commercial (promotional email requiring opt-in).

ssot__SMSTemplateBodyTxt__c.description: The body of the SMS message.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as primary key for the SMS Template DMO.
